message: Wishing you a great birthday and a memorable year. From all of us.
Wishing you a happy birthday and a wonderful year.
Happy Birthday and all the best to you in the year to come!
May your birthday be the start of a year filled with good luck, good health and much happiness.
Wishing you a happy birthday, a wonderful year and success in all you do.
Happy Birthday and thanks for all you do throughout the year.
Wishing you all the happiness you deserve. Have a wonderful birthday!
Best wishes on your birthday. Working with you is truly a pleasure.
Happy Birthday to you. Have a great day and a great year ahead!
The secret to a happy workspace is having awesome colleagues like you. Happy birthday.
